north_star: To provide a robust, scalable, and secure cloud platform that empowers all development teams to innovate and deliver high-quality software efficiently.
mission: To design, build, and maintain a comprehensive cloud platform and supporting tools that enhance the productivity, security, and reliability of the organization's software development efforts.
vision: To be the foundation of the organization's technological innovation, enabling seamless development and operations with a focus on performance, security, and developer satisfaction.

core.description: Individuals or teams that directly use and benefit from the cloud platform and its services.
core.value: Product Engineering Teams, Backend Development Teams

supportive.description: Individuals or teams that influence, support, or collaborate with the Cloud Platform organization.
supportive.value: InfoSec Team, FinOps Team, Operations Team, Business Leadership

peripheral.description: External or less directly involved stakeholders who have an interest in the Cloud Platform organization's outcomes.

kpis.objective: Ensure high availability and reliability of the cloud platform.
kpis.justification: High availability and reliability are crucial for uninterrupted development and operational efficiency.
kpis.measurement: Platform uptime percentage and number of service interruptions.
kpis.outbound: Monthly availability and reliability reports to all stakeholders

kpis.objective: Optimize cloud resource utilization and cost.
kpis.justification: Efficient resource utilization reduces costs and improves overall performance.
kpis.measurement: Cloud cost metrics and resource usage analytics.
kpis.inbound: Cloud usage reports, cost analysis tools
kpis.outbound: Quarterly cost optimization reports to FinOps and Engineering Leadership

kpis.objective: Enhance security and compliance of the cloud platform.
kpis.justification: Robust security practices protect data and ensure regulatory compliance.
kpis.measurement: Number of security incidents and compliance audit results.
kpis.outbound: Monthly security and compliance reports to InfoSec and Business Leadership

kpis.objective: Improve developer experience with the cloud platform.
kpis.justification: A positive developer experience leads to higher productivity and satisfaction.
kpis.measurement: Developer satisfaction scores from internal surveys and feedback.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly satisfaction reports to Product and Engineering Teams

kpis.objective: Reduce time to provision and configure cloud resources.
kpis.justification: Faster provisioning accelerates development and deployment cycles.
kpis.measurement: Average time taken to provision and configure new cloud resources.
kpis.outbound: Bi-monthly provisioning reports to Development Teams

kpis.objective: Increase adoption of best practices and tools across the organization.
kpis.justification: Adopting best practices and tools improves consistency and quality across development teams.
kpis.measurement: Number of teams adopting recommended practices and tools.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly adoption reports to Engineering Leadership

kpis.objective: Enhance collaboration and communication across all teams.
kpis.justification: Better collaboration leads to more effective problem-solving and innovation.
kpis.measurement: Frequency and quality of collaboration meetings and initiatives.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly collaboration reports to all stakeholders
